name: Santa Gets A Tower
description:
It's Christmas time and Santa needs to defend his cabin against invading snowmen! He does so by placing down towers to block their path. Chose between 4 different towers and upgrade them and yourself to stop the snowmen from getting to your cabin!

Features endless wave-based first-person tower defense gameplay, 4 different towers to pick from (5 if you've been extra nice), per tower upgrades, global tower upgrades and player upgrades.

Build notice: Mac and Linux build have not been tested at all as I don't have machines to test on.
